fields.name: vin
fields.title: VIN
fields.hint: The location of the VIN to be read as input

fields.name: make
fields.title: Vehicle Make
fields.hint: Vehicle make will be written to this field

fields.name: model
fields.title: Vehicle Model
fields.hint: Vehicle model will be written to this field

fields.name: year
fields.title: Vehicle Year
fields.hint: Vehicle year will be written to this field

fields.name: cylinderNumbers
fields.title: Engine Number of Cylinders
fields.hint: Number of cylinders of vehicle's engine will be written to this field

fields.name: engineModel
fields.title: Engine Model
fields.hint: Vehicle's engine model will be written to this field

fields.name: enginePower
fields.title: Engine Power (kW)
fields.hint: Vehicle's engine power, in kilorwatts, will be written to this field

fields.name: primaryFuelType
fields.title: Fuel Type - Primary
fields.hint: Vehicle's primary fuel type will be written to this field

fields.name: frontAirBagLocations
fields.title: Front Air Bag Locations
fields.hint: Vehicle's front air bag locations will be written to this field

fields.name: sideAirBagLocations
fields.title: Side Air Bag Locations
fields.hint: Vehicle's side air bag locations will be written to this field
